ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] How do you make money?
ygData.msgSnippet: In the Highpass keep. Pickclaw goblins live there, great exp and money in a group. There is a bank, merchants, food and water, you can be bound there,
ygData.messageBody:
In the Highpass keep. Pickclaw goblins live there, great exp and money in a group. There is a bank, merchants, food and water, you can be bound there, considered an outdoor zone, etc. Go there around level 23 and you can easily get two levels a night there. You could spend from 23 to 40 there if you wanted. In the old days, you had to get on a waiting list to get into a group there, but now it seems like a well hidden secret.
----- Original Message -----
From: D M
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, April 07, 2002 3:43 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] How do you make money?

Highpass basement? wheres that?
(please)

Ecko~

--- "J. Smythe" <lgumaer@...> wrote:
> I made about 300pp in the Highpass Basement just
> looting everything because everyone else was so
> twinked they don't need money.
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: Su

>

>   Don't forget buffing for donations. At lvl 30
> Rangers get sow. So you can
>   sow for donations if no druids, beastlords, or
> shamans are around.
>   luv,
>   -Su
>
>   I guess the obvious ways I can think of are to
> kill lots of green mobs. Camp
>   items in dungeons. Practice trade skills. I have
> spent a great deal of time
>   in the Highpass Basement and when I am in a group
> where everyone is twinked,
>   they often let me get all the loot.
